title: Strawberry Orange Smoothie

preparations.content: Place all ingredients in mixing bowl and blend <b>2 min/speed 10<b>. Serve straight away, or chill and use within 24 hours.

hintsAndTricks: If you prefer a thinner consistency, dilute with water or extra juice as desired.
Use fresh strawberries when they are in season.
Add other fresh or frozen fruits of choice and create your own favourites.
When doubling the recipe, blend 3 min/speed 10.
